name: 英語口語表達
comment: 進階英語課程/榮譽英語學程/供外系選修
restrict: ◎必須先修過【英文（二）】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: 強化學生英語文聆聽、閱讀、口語、寫作的表達能力，協助獲取新知。
提昇學生英語文進階溝通能力及文學素養。
syllabus:
COURSE DESCRIPTION

This class is to help students improve their English speaking skills through activities, such as in-class discussions, interviews with foreigners and outside class event participation.

Week 1                 Course overview & Assignment of final project groups

Week 2                 Unit 7: Problem solving

Week 3                 Unit 7: Problem solving

Week 4                 Unit 8: Behavior

Week 5                 Unit 8: Behavior

Week 6                 Assignment #1: Describe a situation where you had to solve a difficult problem and whether you overcame the obstacle creatively or you regretted what you had done.

Week 7                 Unit 4: Socializing

Week 8                 Unit 4: Socializing

Week 9                 Unit 12: Careers

Week 10              Unit 12: Careers

Week 11              Assignment #2: What do you think you’ll be doing in 10 years?

Week 12              Presentation for English Event Participation

Week 13              Group project presentation

Week 14              Group project presentation

Week 15              Group project presentation & Summary

Week 16              Final Exam

methodologies.note: There will be a group project
Students will have to participate in an English event.

grading.note: class discussion, attendance, Q & A sessions

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【英文（二）】 ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
